Package sait.bms.manager

Class BookManager

java.lang.Object
sait.bms.manager.BookManager
public class BookManager extends Object
Assignment 1 - Books
Author:
Hoa Nguyen, Miguel Mulingbayan The bookManager Class contains all the methods that will work with the book.txt data

      private void displayBookByType()
      This method shows the books by type
      Parameters:
      inputType - The user input which chooses what kind of book to check
      inputFormat - The user input which chooses the format of the book
      inputDiet - The user input which chooses the diet of the book
      inputGenre - The user input which chooses the genre of the book
      inputFrequency - The user input which chooses the frequency of the book

    • produceRandomBookList

      private void produceRandomBookList(ArrayList<Book> books)
      This method will produce a number of random books
      Parameters:
      books - Uses the books ArrayList
      random - Makes a random object
      numRanBooks - The number of books the user chooses
      ranIndex - Uses the random to choose a random number throughout the Array List
